survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the effectiveness and user experience of AI-powered customer support tools.

questions.question_text: How often do you interact with AI-powered customer support tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to simplify data analysis.

script.question_text: How often do you interact with AI-powered customer support tools?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered customer support tools have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to capture multiple tool usage.
